h1.title: Convert TIFF to ICO Online
h1.description: Free and fast TIFF to ICO converter for favicons and desktop icons. Works instantly on any device — no signup required.

converter.title: TIFF to ICO Converter
converter.description: Convert TIFF images to multi-size ICO icons with transparency preserved when available.

h2.title: Why Convert TIFF to ICO?
h2.description:
ICO is purpose-built for icons and favicons:

  • Multi-size in one file: 16–256 px variants bundled for crisp rendering.
  • Favicon standard: Works across major browsers.
  • Windows native: Ideal for desktop/app/shortcut icons.
  • Transparency: Alpha support for smooth edges.

h2.title: How to Convert TIFF to ICO Online
h2.description:
1. Click Upload TIFF and select your image.
  2. Wait for processing and optimization.
  3. Click Download ICO to save your icon.

We generate common icon sizes automatically.

h2.title: Supported Limits & Formats
h2.description:
• Accepted input: TIFF (image/tiff)
  • Maximum file size: up to 16 MB per file
  • Output: ICO (.ico, MIME image/x-icon)
  • Pages: Multi-page TIFFs: only the first page is converted.

h2.title: Best Practices for Sharp Icons
h2.description:
• Start with a square image and add padding to avoid clipping.
  • Use clear shapes and high contrast for 16–32 px sizes.
  • If you need transparent edges, ensure the TIFF contains an alpha channel or convert a PNG with transparency instead.

h2.title: Troubleshooting
h2.description:
• Favicon not updating: Clear browser cache and ensure you link /favicon.ico with <link rel="icon" href="/favicon.ico">.
  • Jagged small sizes: Upload a larger, clean source; the tool will downscale to 16–32 px.
  • Upload fails: Confirm image/tiff and ≤ 16 MB.

faq.question: Is this TIFF to ICO converter free?
faq.answer: Yes, the converter is completely free with no hidden charges or subscriptions.

faq.question: Will ICO work on all operating systems?
faq.answer: ICO is natively supported on Windows and recognized by major browsers. macOS/Linux tools can view/edit ICO as well.

faq.question: What sizes are supported for ICO files?
What file sizes are supported?
faq.answer: You can upload images up to 16 MB per file.

faq.question: Are my files safe?
faq.answer: Files are processed automatically and not retained longer than necessary for conversion.

faq.question: Can I convert multiple TIFFs at once?
faq.answer: This page converts one file at a time. For bulk needs, repeat the process or use a batch tool.

faq.question: Does the converter keep transparency?
faq.answer: If your TIFF includes an alpha channel, transparency will be preserved in the ICO.

note: Multi-page TIFFs: only the first page is converted. For best results, use a square image with padding and, if needed, a source that includes transparency.
